com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers
Class DependencyChangeWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.urbancode.ubuild.scripting.wrappers.DependencyChangeWrapper

public class DependencyChangeWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

Scripting class to give limited access to DependencyChange information. This is exposed through methods on the buildLife object in notification scripts.

Examples:

To get the name for a dependency change: 

    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).getName()
To get the previous build life for a dependency change: 
    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).getPreviousBuildLife()
To check if the dependency change is an addition: 
    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).isAddition()
To check if the dependency change is a change: 
    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).isChange()
To check if the dependency change is a removal: 
    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).isRemoval()
If you are using velocity scripts for Notification Templates, you don't have to use the full method name for getters: 
    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).Name
    buildLife.getDependencyChanges().get(0).PreviousBuildLife
